title: Dems Divided on Israel Comments
description:
From the moment House Democrats took control of power, they have had one, unifying objective: to push back against what they saw as the wrongdoings of the Trump administration. But a fight inside the party has now developed over the U.S.'s policy toward Israel and accusations of anti-Semitism. David Meyers speaks to Bloomberg's congressional corespondent Anna Edgerton on how it's a fight pitting the old guard of the party against the new guard and threatening a generational rift. 
FOLLOW UP
Anna's latest report: Anti-Semitism Rebuke Leads to Growing Discord Among Democrats
You can follow Anna at: @annaedge4
----
TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!

itunes:subtitle: with Anna Edgerton (Bloomberg News)
